participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and enthusiastic, loves to share experiences and is passionate about teaching.
participant_1.background: My favorite band is up and I got to see them in concert once. I'm an elementary school teacher. My parents were also teachers. For vacation I enjoy time at the beach.

participant_2.name: Robert
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and friendly, enjoys outdoor activities and has a wealth of life experience to share.
participant_2.background: I go gambling in my spare time. I like to grill outdoors. I enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days. I move south during the winter. I have been retired for a few years.
